channel.title: [PI]Virtue-pkers / first release
channel.description:
Hello and This is my first release, hope u like :)
Webclient ready!!
~Server features
- Same old edge as home :S - PVP DROPS! - Correct Chaotic animations! - VLS spec! - All Godswords spec - Improved DCLAWS (Now hits 4x on npc and players!) - All other specs works! - Correct animation for any axe @ woodcutting! - Correct animation for Theving! - SKILL interfaces for every skill! (more detailed!) - Customs + Bonuses!) - Added DONATOR zone - Added DONATOR tab (with working functions) * you need to be a donator to open this tab!* - Corporeal beast! - Added Welcome interface WITH rules! - Npc that resets stats + Npc that locks XP - NPC that give u a DFS only IF you got a visage + 1m cash! - Added lvl 1-2-3 clue scrolls - WORKING OVERLOADS! (No way to get ATM, so you have to add it to a drop or to a shop). - CUSTOM ASSAULT (You and put ur own rewards in the shop.) :p )- Fixed some bugs. - Fixed pest control - Fixed fight pits - Fixed duel arena - Bandos now drops bandos items. - Veng works 100% - Custom quest tab. - INGAME HIGHSCORE etc.. - Working korasi with 100% spec - Great Switching - Changed shops
Now for pictures.
Log in / background
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/828/22747291.png/][IMG]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/1418/22747291.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
When u log in the rules will pop up.
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/163/72346838.png/][IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/9172/72346838.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
All pvp armour/weapons and some nice customs even chaotics and korasi! XD
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/268/37758465.png/][IMG]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/7057/37758465.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
SHOPS!
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/19/99030626.png/][IMG]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/8740/99030626.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/705/12383601.png/][IMG]http://img705.imageshack.us/img705/7451/12383601.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/35/93580363.png/][IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/2572/93580363.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/546/44375710.png/][IMG]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/5951/44375710.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
Working duel arena!
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/32/99143965.png/][IMG]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/8414/99143965.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/268/46740033.png/][IMG]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/6952/46740033.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
Scan [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/20/77614438.png/][IMG]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/5674/77614438.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
Alot more guys just cbf uploading all of the pictures! Download to see more
Package :
Credits : Luckscape source Me Nameless and who ever i missed out
Cache auto downloads, if not download this : http://dl.dropbox.com/u/44290655/virtuev2.zip
Idc if u guys say that i didnt do much or anything because i know that i did alot on this server, injoly.

item.title: [PI]Virtue-pkers / first release
item.dc:creator: @ilovebots ilovebots
item.description:
@ilovebots wrote:

Hello and This is my first release, hope u like

Webclient ready!!

~Server features

  • Same old edge as home :S
  • PVP DROPS!
  • Correct Chaotic animations!
  • VLS spec!
  • All Godswords spec
  • Improved DCLAWS (Now hits 4x on npc and players!)
  • All other specs works!
  • Correct animation for any axe @ woodcutting!
  • Correct animation for Theving!
  • SKILL interfaces for every skill! (more detailed!)
  • Customs + Bonuses!)
  • Added DONATOR zone
  • Added DONATOR tab (with working functions)
  • you need to be a donator to open this tab!*
  • Corporeal beast!
  • Added Welcome interface WITH rules!
  • Npc that resets stats + Npc that locks XP
  • NPC that give u a DFS only IF you got a visage + 1m cash!
  • Added lvl 1-2-3 clue scrolls
  • WORKING OVERLOADS! (No way to get ATM, so you have to add it to a drop or to a shop).
  • CUSTOM ASSAULT (You and put ur own rewards in the shop.)
    )- Fixed some bugs.
  • Fixed pest control
  • Fixed fight pits
  • Fixed duel arena
  • Bandos now drops bandos items.
  • Veng works 100%
  • Custom quest tab.
  • INGAME HIGHSCORE etc…
  • Working korasi with 100% spec
  • Great Switching
  • Changed shops

Now for pictures.

Log in / background

When u log in the rules will pop up.
